Class KaaEndpointRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.lapuile.wearsensor.repositories.KaaEndpointRepository
public class KaaEndpointRepository
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to ask Kaa about endpoint values

  • Method Details

    • getKaaEndpointsData

      public java.util.List<com.example.lapuile.wearsensor.library.models.KaaEndpoint> getKaaEndpointsData​(java.lang.String timeSeriesName, java.lang.String fromDate, java.lang.String toDate, java.lang.String includeTime, java.lang.String sort, long samplePeriod) throws java.lang.Exception
      Function that returns the data obtained from Kaa EPTS API based on the parameters specified below (FOR EVERY ENDPOINT)
      Parameters:
      timeSeriesName - dataNames that you want to retrieve for every end(ex. "temperature,humidity")
      fromDate - "Date" from which to retrieve the data
      toDate - "Date" up to which to recover the data
      includeTime - defines whether fromDate and toDate are inclusive [from, to, both, none]
      sort - data sorting [ASC, DESC]
      samplePeriod - The data sampling period
      Returns:
      List of KaaEndpoint
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong while retrieving the data

    • getKaaEndpointsData

      public static java.util.List<com.example.lapuile.wearsensor.library.models.KaaEndpoint> getKaaEndpointsData​(java.lang.String timeSeriesName) throws java.lang.Exception
      Function that returns, for every endpoint, the data obtained from Kaa EPTS API without values. Used to get the dataNamesof every endpoint
      Parameters:
      timeSeriesName - dataNames that you want to retrieve for every end(ex. "temperature,humidity")
      Returns:
      List of KaaEndpoint without any values inside
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong

    • getKaaEndpointsData

      public static java.util.List<com.example.lapuile.wearsensor.library.models.KaaEndpoint> getKaaEndpointsData​(java.util.List<com.example.lapuile.wearsensor.library.models.KaaEndpointConfiguration> kaaEndpointConfigurations, java.lang.String fromDate, java.lang.String toDate, java.lang.String includeTime, java.lang.String sort, long samplePeriod) throws java.lang.Exception
      Function that returns the data obtained from Kaa EPTS API based on the parameters specified below
      Parameters:
      kaaEndpointConfigurations - List of KaaEndpointConfiguration that tells the API which data retrieve for which endpoint
      fromDate - "Date" from which to retrieve the data
      toDate - "Date" up to which to recover the data
      includeTime - defines whether fromDate and toDate are inclusive [from, to, both, none]
      sort - data sorting [ASC, DESC]
      samplePeriod - The data sampling period
      Returns:
      List of KaaEndpoint
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong while retrieving the data

    • getKaaEndpointsData

      public static java.util.List<com.example.lapuile.wearsensor.library.models.KaaEndpoint> getKaaEndpointsData​(java.util.List<com.example.lapuile.wearsensor.library.models.KaaEndpointConfiguration> kaaEndpointConfigurations) throws java.lang.Exception
      Function that returns, for the specified endpoints, the data obtained from Kaa EPTS API without values. Used to get the dataNames of selected endpoint
      Parameters:
      kaaEndpointConfigurations - List of KaaEndpointConfiguration that tells the API which data retrieve for which endpoint
      Returns:
      List of KaaEndpoint without any values inside
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong while retrieving the data
